title: Software Developer
description: As a Government Employee under a contractual agreement, working in the Information Systems Development Subdivision for auditing, one is part of a team responsible for developing and maintaining systems for auditing purposes. To fulfill these responsibilities, a range of technical skills, including .NET WEB API, .NET WEB MVC, JQuery, Dart, and Flutter, are utilized to create and optimize applications and services that support the audit processes.

title: Customer Services
description: Providing administrative services to participants, processing administrative data, responding to information requests and handling complaints, as well as developing several innovative applications.

title: Retail Surveyor
description: Conducting a survey on the sales of SIM cards, phone credits, and internet packages from telecommunications providers and presenting the results in the form of a chart.
